name: Minimal Ninja: The Big Fallen
description:
Description

A fast game of a ninja trying to avoid all the obstacles and obtain the best score possible in every course. With classic mechanics and retro vibes you should be able to score your max in an every time faster track and difficult!

How To Play?

Touch on the coloured squares to find a way to go through the floors or collect the keys to open it!  

Try to obtain 10 coins to get a extra live if you are damaged.

Don't forget to use the buttons for move the ninja to left and right and try to survive as long as possible.
